welcome.title: Professional career certifications are different!
welcome.body: If you already have an account, log in to Careerzen using your existing account.

verify_email.title: Sign up!
verify_email.body: Professional personal members, please make sure to verify your personal email, work emails make it harder to find your account if you leave..
verify_email.alert_body: 모든 개인정보는 암호화를 통해 저장되어 비공개 상태가 유지되요. 본인의 승인하에만 상대방에게 공개될 수 있어요.

accordion.terms_of_services_description: 모든 개인정보는 암호화를 통해 저장되어 비공개 상태가 유지되요. 본인의 승인하에만 상대방에게 공개될 수 있어요.

accordion.reward_notification_description: 모든 개인정보는 암호화를 통해 저장되어 비공개 상태가 유지되요. 본인의 승인하에만 상대방에게 공개될 수 있어요.

join_project.title: Join Project
join_project.body: Join this project to start working on it.
join_project.message_ex: Tell us a little bit about yourself

invite_member.title: Invite member
invite_member.body: At the same time as inviting team members, managers, and clients who worked on the project together, a request for evaluation of my performance is also sent.
invite_member.can_not_find: I can not find my nickname.
invite_member.name: Name

list.message2: Own your own career proof NFT!
list.banner2: Award NFTs to projects and individuals and be an influential group!

create.title: Create Group
create.description: 학교, 회사, 기관은 대표 이메일 인증 후, 그룹을 생성할 수 있어요.

form.help_text: 해당 그룹은 조직 대표 이메일 인증이 필요해요. 대표 메일을 입력하고 인증코드를 확인해주세요.

invite.sended_desc: Once the user receives the message and accepts the invitation, they will be added as a new member. You can check the status of the invitation in member management.
invite.name: Name

join.join_group_desc: Send a request message to the group leader. If the leader approves, you can become a group member.
join.message_placeholder: Hello, I am Gil-dong Hong, a front-end developer.

mission.quit_title: Do you want to force end the mission?
mission.quit_desc: If you force end the mission, you can no longer update the achievement status of the mission, and members will not be able to receive NFT rewards.
